name: BUGGO from BROOD X
description:
Buggo needs to find his way to the surface after 17 years under ground. Guide him to his emergence location (checkered flag) by navigating the 3D maze. You can use the arrow keys or on-screen buttons to move (hold shift+arrow keys to move forward/back and rotate the camera).

This project has lots of potential, but I spent the whole jam getting a level generator which doesn't even really work, so look out for an update... someday!
